Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Randolph/ Stetson
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses rerouted Southbound buses will operate via Wacker & State. Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus & Wacker

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Randolph/ Stetson, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker and State

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop- bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop- bound Brown  Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problems on a train at Kedzie . Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop- bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problems on a train at Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
